document.full_text: keiko fujimori, the daughter of former president alberto k. fujimori, who is in prison for rights abuses, says she wants her father cleared through the courts.
document.title: the saturday profile: a second fujimori contends for peru's presidency
lines_and_colors: keiko fujimori, the daughter of former president alberto k. fujimori, who is in prison for rights abuses, says she wants her father cleared through the courts.
